item.description:
Dear Westborough spirituality meetup group member,

How are you? I know it has been awhile that we have not have meetup. It is summer time. Hope everyone enjoy summer so far. The weather is nice, vegetables and flowers bloom.

Last month, we had a great time. We always have a great discussion and we share a lot of informations.

Join me for this discussion and we can take a little walk after discussion, If the weather is nice.

Thank you

Â 

Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: 147 will be 2nd building on your right when you drive into Carlton. You can park in the guest parking sign area
item.name: Westborough Spirituality July Meetup
